features: Conditioning Strips with hypoallergenic Aloe formula for Sensitive Skin
High-Performance Razor system with an easy-to-grip, stylish rubber handle
Pivoting Head expertly designed to follow the curves and contours of a woman's body
body.description: The Schick Quattro for Women Razor offers a silky smooth shave with its pivoting, 4 ultra-thin blades designed specifically for women. The easy-to-grip rubber handle feels comfortable and balanced in your hand, while the hypoallergenic formula conditioning strips help to reduce irritation, for a shave so smooth you can skip a day or two. Designed specifically for a woman's body, the curves of the cartridge follow your natural shape. The blades offer flexibility and effortless glide into hard-to-reach places. Choose between Schick Quattro for Women Ultra Smooth or Sensitive blade refills for long-lasting, smoothness. All Schick Quattro for Women Refills can be used with any Schick Quattro for Women Razor

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Pick up 6ct. refills! Choose between Schick Quattro for Women Ultra Smooth or Sensitive blade refills for long-lasting, smoothness. All Schick Quattro for Women Refills can be used with any Schick Quattro for Women Razor. Schick Quattro for Women Sensitive Value Pack Refill A Shave So Smooth You Can Skip a Day or Two! The Schick Quattro for Women Razor offers a smooth shave with its pivoting, 4 ultra-thin blades designed specifically for women. The easy-to-grip rubber handle feels comfortable and balanced in your hand. The hypoallergenic formula conditioning strip helps to reduce irritation, for a shave so smooth you can skip a day or two. Designed specifically for a woman's body, the curves of the cartridge follow your natural shape. The blades offer flexibility and effortless glide into hard-to-reach places.

Schick Quattro for Women Sensitive Refill features include: 4 Ultra-Thin Blades for long-lasting smoothness. Conditioning Strip with hypoallergenic Aloe formula for Sensitive Skin. High-Performance Razor System with an easy-to-grip, stylish rubber handle. Pivoting Head expertly designed to follow the curves and contours of a woman’s body.

4 Ultra-Thin blades for long-lasting smoothness Designed specifically for a woman's body, the curves of the cartridge follow your natural shape. 4 ultra-thin blades help to provide a precise shave while the pivoting head offers flexibility and effortless glide into hard-to-reach areas. For Sensitive skin, the refills feature a conditioning strip that is specially formulated with hypoallergenic formula with Aloe to provide long-lasting smoothness for sensitive skin, so you could skip a day or two. The Schick Quattro for Women Refill Cartridges is designed for use with any Schick Quattro for Women razor.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These are the best razor blades I have ever used.
reviews.reviewText: Out of all the razor blades I have used in over 50 years of shaving, these are the best!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 10, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Price for a Great Product
reviews.reviewText: These are the best razors and love the fact that I can use the same handle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I've been using this razor for a while now and love it. I highly recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not a knock off same quality but better!
reviews.reviewText: I have nothing bad to say about these razors they are not a knock off there the real thing I get these every so many months at my local drugstore and they charge double the price for these razors I wish I would’ve known about purchasing them online and save me some money I know this sounds weird but they feel even more sharper and slick than ones I buy in the store if that’s possible. They do not cut me or nick me or irritate my skin at all feels like baby smooth skin afterwards and this is coming from somebody who has thick coarse hair I don’t know if somebody purchased from the wrong seller and I accidentally put the bad reviews on here because I seriously have no regrets on purchasing them they are not a knock offs I have the real ones at home to compare them to, there the samething why spend more when you can spend less for the same product!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The Quattros I usually buy are fairly good blades. The only difference with these is the moisture strip. I returned them for a refund because the number of blades was 1/2 the number advertised. So although they are pretty good blades, they're just too much.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 22, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Dull- definitely not the same From stores
reviews.reviewText: I’ve used this brand for years and never had to order online before…. these are terrible and extremely dull! Made my skin so itchy and dried out! Arms, lgs and armpits !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 20, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple and Effective
reviews.reviewText: I've been using these razors for most of my adult life. They're simple and effective and dont irritate my skin. Most razors over-complicate things and these just have it right. Wonderful for sensitive skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 13, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My Quattro loves these blades
reviews.reviewText: Nice price for a set of 10 blades. I’ve been using my quattro for years and nice to have a choice of replacement blades.
Using these was worse than the non sensitive razors. When I buy them from the store they’re perfect, but these were dull on arrival. Almost like they were used, but they looked clean and fresh.
Unfortunately my new razors seem to be dull.
